subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Hunter Mahan’s nine-under-par round on the 7,319-yard, par-71 layout was the lowest first-round score in the 41 years the tournament has been played.
snippet: Hunter Mahan’s nine-under-par round on the 7,319-yard, par-71 layout was the lowest first-round score in the 41 years the tournament has been played.
